roleset.name: sell again
roleset.note: RESELL-V NOTES: I doubt the higher numbered args will appear. (from resell.01-v)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Remarketers make modifications to IBM's computer hardware and resell the products.

example.name: with buyer
example.text: ``On occasion, he paid a high price,'' Mr. Wachter concedes, but he says those who bid less and dropped out were dealers who *trace*-1 would then have marked up the paintings *trace*-1 to resell them at a profit to collectors.
